Blog.post: What am i gonna do??? oh no....
I'm so sad..missed *him* so much....

Oh,i forgot to tell what i bought from the stall my tutor had put up at 'Tanglin Mall.I bought 3 tops.The 1st one is a plain tank top(COAX),2nd this red sleeveless top with the letter 'P' sewn with sequins and lastly is a white sleeveless top with pink outer lining.I really like all of them.Wish i could have gotten more:(

Holy Moo!!! Schools gonna start tomorrow.It should be a new term but for me it's the same old thing.I'm just so irritated that i've got to take bus 133 then 851,852 or 13 to Yio Chu Kang Secondary School.Enter through the back gate,go and assemble,look at my friends with a irritated look,sing the national anthem,listen to the announcements teachers have for the whole school,go back to class and hell begins....The only thing on my mind is "WILL ANY F***ING TERRORIST PLANT A BOMB IN MY SCH?"[impossible]..k i betta go and iron my freaking uniform or i'll have to suffer early in the morning ironing it. So good night everyone.

Today i'm going to Tanglin Mall because my tutor told me that she and her pals are selling some stuffs like clothes and accessories.So anyone of you guys interested just drop by there.You can see me there and we can go shopping together. ;)

I can't believe that i had this strangest dream ever.It all starts at this tamil camp i think.With most faces i see in school.As the camp ended,everybody headed for the exit sign.For me,i saw this cute little hamster on the floor.I picked him up and all of a sudden i was at Orchard if i'm not mistaken.I was having the hamster in my hand.It bit my delicate hand...lol..and i dropped it(CRUEL).Then i picked it up again and i said sorry to it but it vanished in my hand[CRAZY].I continued to walk.After much walking, i came to this taxi stand.There i saw this gril from my primary school.Her name is Jasmine from class 6C.I've got no idea why is she in my dream because i've never spoken to her for once in my six years of school in KCPPS.She asked me if i was going for Jessica Teo's birthday party.I immediately said yes without thinking.So she said that she has got to go to the place as soon as possible because the 'birthday girl',Jessica needed some help with the preparations.So she went off saying that she would see me at the party.Then this SBS bus appeared.It was bus 166.It stopped at the taxi stand and all the passengers including me boarded the bus.1 thing that i thought was stupid that,why would a bus stop at a taxi stand instead of a bus stop.But anyway it doesnt matter where it stops.wat matters is i've got to get my ass at Jessica's party.Once i got onto the bus i found a perfecr seat for myself which was at the back of the bus in the corner.I was just looking out the window when suddenly there was a voice saying,'this castle was built by a lady and it's the 1st time ever in history, a castle being built by a lady'.'WOW'Can anybody imagine a castle being built by a lady...not just a lady but by an asian lady.That voice was a man's voice.Like those in tour buses,where u have your tour guide talking.The castle was really huge and it had a disgusting color,brown.So i pressed the bell and alighted at the stop.I was wondering if Jessica was out of her mind wanting to celebrate her birthday in a castle which wasn't even hers.I made my way up where Jessica had her party with the help of a 'manager' of the castle.Jessica was wlecoming everyone with her gorgeous smile.Then i immediately asked her what was going on.. why are you having a party here.She said that Its a place where you can held parties and funtions.I was shocked.Totally shocked to what she had said because who would ever built a castle just for functions to be held.WEll..its all in my dreamland.Would never happen in reality.There were many indian girls there.They came up to me and introduced themselves to me.Very friendly girls.KInda funny seeing so many indian girls there.Jess is probably getting hooked into the indian mania.. lol.That the end of the dream.I know it is very lame but that was exactly what i dreamt.

Am I irritated? Yes What do I want the most right now? A great vacation Why am I irritated? Because i'm sick of seeing the same faces all the time,especially those whom i despise.And guess what,i still gotta see their f***ing faces!! Will I get over this? I hope so.
Why do you look like a DRACULA to me?? urlLink
I'm back..da devil's back...had a borin weekend..well it wasn't that bad tho...
i juz love her actin..keep it up Neve Campbell!!! :) urlLink
I'm gonna kill him..kill him as soon as i can..Well if i can't kill him the way i want him dead, he must suffer a slow death..a very slow death...aaaaaaaahahahahahahah!!!
SUCH A BORIN DAY AS USUAL...SO SUNNY.. I'M SO BORED...REALLY REALLY BORED...MY LIFE IS SO DAMN BORIN!!! URGH!!!
OH OH!!! It's already 7.
I'm gonna take my shower now.... feelin so dirty.. after cleanin my room. I juz hope that my room won't get dirtied fer anotha week *_*
Paradise[THAILAND].... A place that i'm dyin to go to.. well i'm gonna go there..& i can't wait ta go there....urgh!!! urlLink
Didn't receive a call from anyone..nobody..just nobody..*sighs* I really miss usin the phone for long long hours..I miss my rabbit:(
Damn!! Why does it haf to be so freakin hott??? Urgh..!!Waitin fer it to be 3..so i can go & watch 'Bold & The Beautiful'..lol i noe..soap opera..wad to do.. im hooked to it..
Watched da movie "Red Sneakers".. @ Hallmark... Gr8 movie.. ..MAn!! now i feel like playin basketball...

What a mornin...when i woke up,i thought that my dad was still gettin ready for work.Normally i don't wake up when my dad is there coz he will ask me to do so many stuffs like iron his shirt & all.But he was gone. K, I'm just so lame. Why on earth am i tellin ..all this unecessary..things..lol..Oh & my dad just called,he said he's in Tan Tock Seng Hospital.So i guess he might just come home soon..*sighs* I can't come online then..(Gr8!)

Hello..nonnoo hi..That's betta.. or yo..nah..that's not me at all..Well all thank to jess.. Tat I've got a blog..kinda cool..im tokin to myself..i wanna give a shoutout to jess(THANK U SO MUCH)..So happy that ive found most of my primary school pals..Especially Jessica teo kiat yee..ahh.. feels so good..she's found..atlast.. Missed her..Well now that i've found her,i need not worry..thnk u friendster,u did a great job..k..i beta stop here fer today..ill continue tomorrow..gd nite..to er..evryne..tata!!

Man, it's so damn hot outside. Poor trees..feelin so hot!!! But they need sunlight to photosynthesize rite?? Oh.. Why am I talkin bout science when I should be thinkin of what to do to keep myself cool. I just hope that i'll be cool in no time. Gosh!! In a day, i post messages 3 times. Crazy!!!

casper van dien is so cute.. urlLink If only he was here right now..*sighs*But he is so old. Well who cares about his age.All i want is him..just him and only him .I wonder what on earth is he doing now. Probably having a great time with his beloved wife![sacarstic]
Wht does FHM mean? Famous hot Models or F***ing Hot Models?
I wanna loose weight and grow taller so bad....

Today, I ended school early.Then went to Ang Mo Kio Central[hate that place] as she wanted to buy some hair stuffs.I suddnely remembered that i forgot to bring my keys with me.So once i reached under my block, i had to wait for my mum to come back.I waited and waited.Suddenly came a young chinese man.Gave me the news paper and told me to read.I wondered why did he give me the papers.Then i realised that he has seen me there for long.So i read and waited,read and waited.2 hours passed and my sis came back.She asked me 'why are you under the block?' I said i thought mum wasn't back yet.She called my house and there was my mum sleeping.I'm such a fool not to see my mum go up by the other staircase.This is how precious time is being wasted!!!!

Good news!!! I have a nokia 8250 phone.Keshan please don't say i'm showing off.Well maybe i am but it's my 1st time owning a handphone of my own.It's such an old model,but anyway who cares what model it is.All that matters is that i've got a phone.I'll be getting a new one,one that i like and chose from the DBS brochure-a seimen CF62. I'm so delighted.

I can't belive that today, i didn't even have a grain of rice.In the morning i had vegeterian noodles followed by my yummy cadbury vanialla ice-cream with ovaltine,green tea,2 paddle pop ice-cream....that was what i had.Now i got to do something about the sugar in my body.Anybody can come and lick me coz i taste so sweet today.... :) Oh! and i have found my elizabeth chandler book-No Time To Die
Am i suppose to study for the test when i know nothing about it and to know everything about it would take a very long time.URGH!!!!!!!!!!!
Tomorrow is my accounts exam.And here i am slouching infornt of my computer and typing my blog.
SORRY KESHAN..i just can't keep my fingers off the keyboard. :)
LUv u Mental Case,nut case,ass hole,idiot...hahahah

I'm dyin.... i need a break...omg!!! I have not started memorising my 8 pages of notes...SHIT,SHIT,SHIt. it's already 7.34p.m....and i yet have to take my damn shower....Somebody..freeze da time.. :( urlLink

So strssed up!!!! EXAMs are here... and i'm dying. OH no!!!! Tomorrow is my social studies....freaking merger & seperation.I need my tution but the tutor sux...Now gotta find a new 1.Theres no time at all...URGH..hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!
I'M DEAD!!!!!Have not done my tonnes of tution work yet....she's gonna kill me!!!!

Oh...and i almost forgot.It's my first time ever that i've taken a neo print.Really cool..but i dun't look good in it.(i've always never looked good in it) & the worst thing is that i want to take again next week before exam starts.

Holy Holy Holy....Tution has started.My brand new tutor came on Sunday,she's like short with permed-highlighted hair(cool),strict[really good].The reason i say its good coz,ill be a good girl and do all the work she gives me.I got to start completing my assignments and must hand it in on time or she'll explode, and i won't want to see the other side of her!!!!
POOr POOr!! Marykate, she's sufferin from anorexia.Hope that she will get well soon and start her University in New York.
School sucks as usual.Everyday is so damn borin! URGH....So stressed up coz mock exam is just around da freaking corner.*sobs* :(

Wow! Had a long weekend.Didn't update my bloggie at all :( School has started,evrythings gettin harder as you've got to start studyin everyday.I had my N'level english oral.Sucked alot,could have done way much better but too late as i can't turn back time.Got to do well the next time!
Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie are so damn rich.They bought a brand new space wagon for the ledding family.COOL!
BAD,BAD,BAd...Did my exams so badly.Mum lectured me.Betta Buck up div!!
SHIT,SHIT,SHIT!!!! I'VE LOST MY PURSE FOR THE 8TH OR 9TH TIME...WHAT A DISASTER!!!HOPE THE PERSON WILL RETURN IT TO ME......................*sobs*
Can't wait to see Ashlee Simpson at skate park on the 15th or August performing for free.Well and tickets can be won for the mosh pit.But i dun't want to be in that.
Just finished watching Agent Cody Banks 2.Wish i could be a secret agent.Won't that be so cool?????
It's been a great weekend.I went to the skin doctor somewhere kinda far.Have no idea where is it.So depressed that theres school tomorrow.I just despise school.

Cool Cool Cool!!! I didn't go to school and i was hiding in my cupboard because of my dad as the other day when i didn't go to school he wasn't happy about it so today i just had to hide in there.It wasn't easy at all as the space limit was very tiny.All i did was just stand sneeze & sweat.It was terrible.[haha] I was waiting and waiting.Then mydog came in she saw me in the cupboard and was prob wondering what is my owner doing in there.Thank goodness she didn't bark or i would have been caught by the ' DEVIL "(he's my dad) aahahahahah

This is so so so bad!!!! For my social studies mock exam,i didn't go.Maths paper 2,i didn't go.Tomorrow which is my physics and chemistry 'I'M NOT GOING!!!!' I better get a mc for this because for the previous 2, no mc was present.DIVYA OH DIVYA....WHAT IS HAPPENING TO YOU. BETTER BUCK UP!!!!!!

Had a great Saturday but not Sunday.I'm running out of things to talk with him.What is wrong with me or is it the both of us? Is it normal?Hope everything will be alright soon.Shitified!!! Theres school tomorrow.What a boring life I have!!!
